name: Donny & Dinna (Victor Rosas)
description:
Donny & Dinna is a cooperative multiplayer game for two players in which they will have to solve puzzles together to recover precious oxygen.

Made by Conecorp.

Victor Rosas: Level Design, Programming helper.

Rafael Vitriago: Game Director, UI/UX Designer, Art.

Diego Espinoza: Main Programmer

Christian Cisterna: Level Design, Models.
